tasks.label: npm: watch
tasks.detail: Continuous build with file watching. Use during active development sessions when making iterative code changes. Runs as a background task and automatically rebuilds on file changes. Preferred for the 'Run Extension' launch configuration.

tasks.label: npm: build
tasks.detail: One-time production build. Use for single builds before testing, packaging (.vsix), or when you need a clean build without watch mode overhead. Used by 'Run Extension (No Watch)' and 'Run Extension (kserve workspace)' launch configurations.

tasks.label: npm: package
tasks.detail: Create a .vsix package for distribution. Use when preparing to publish or share the extension. Automatically runs 'npm run build' first via vscode:prepublish.
